snippet: In his State of the State address, Gov. John W. Hickenlooper of Colorado called for universal background checks on all gun sales, a proposal applauded by Democrats.
abstract: Colorado Gov John W Hickenlooper, in his State of the State address, calls for universal background checks on all gun sales in state, proposal that is applauded by Democrats; comments come in wake of July 2012 Aurora movie theater massacre and December 2012 Newtown, Conn, school shooting.
lead_paragraph: In his State of the State address, Gov. John W. Hickenlooper of Colorado called for universal background checks on all gun sales, a proposal applauded by Democrats.

headline.seo: Governor of Colorado Calls for Background Checks on All Gun Sales
headline.main: Governor of Colorado Calls for Stricter Controls on Gun Sales
headline.print_headline: Governor of Colorado Calls for Stricter Controls on Gun Sales
